overview.en: Avatar Network is an EOS based value ecosystem, which runs in a decentralized mode, driven by smart contract. In Avatar Network all the professionals and companies can meet, recruit and interact safely, trustfully and efficiently.
overview.zh: Avatar Network是一个基于EOS的价值生态系统，在智能合约的推动下以分散模式运行。在阿凡达网络中，所有专业人士和公司都可以安全，可靠和高效地会面，招募和互动。
